title: Swansea interested in signing Amin Younes from Ajax
description: Swansea are interested in signing Ajax winger Amin Younes, according to Sky in Italy.
content: The 24-year-old winger joined the Dutch side from Borussia Monchengladbach in 2015 but has been limited to nine league appearances this season, with his contract due to expire at the end of the campaign.Younes played the full match for Ajax in their Europa League final defeat to Manchester United last year, and would provide competition for places in a Swansea side that sit bottom of the Premier League.Carlos Carvalhal has picked up four points from his first three league fixtures in charge, but is yet to bring in any reinforcements during the January transfer windowSwansea, who host Liverpool live on Sky Sports Premier League on Monday, are also interested in bringing back West Ham forward Andre Ayew to the Liberty Stadium, according to Sky sources.
